message: I propose a fair split. You get 10%, I get 90%. Let's end this quickly.
You're being generous, but I think I deserve more. Let's see if you can do better.
Let's compromise.  I'll take 60, you take 40.  This way we both get a decent amount, and we can move on.
I'm not getting taken advantage of. You're getting a smaller share than I deserve. I'll take 70, and you can try to do better next time.
Let's be reasonable.  We both get 50.  No more haggling, just a simple and fair split.
I'm not budging. You're being too generous with your 50/50 offer. I'm taking 80, and you can try to negotiate better next time.
Okay, I'm willing to go down to 40% to get this done.  Let's end this, I'm not sure how much more we can both lose with inflation.
I'm not falling for your 40% offer. I'm taking 85, and you're getting a smaller share than before. You should be worried about inflation eating into your share.
I'm willing to accept a 30/70 split. Inflation is hitting us both hard, and I don't want to risk getting nothing at all. Let's end this now.
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting greedy. I'm taking 90, and you're getting a tiny fraction. You should have accepted my previous offers when you had the chance.
This is my final offer. We're both losing a lot to inflation, so I'm willing to take 25% to end this. I'm not sure if we can both get anything in the next round. Please accept.
